Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides that it shall not be discrimination when a person's immutable attribute, characteristic or trait, or religious belief, marital status or disability interferes with ability to meet employment requirements
Summary: Provides that it shall not be harassment or discrimination when a person's immutable attribute, characteristic or trait, or his or her religious belief, marital status or disability interferes with such individual's ability to meet employment requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง40-c, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the right to be free from harassment and discrimination
